mapper.insert: insert into meeting_room( meeting_room_name, meeting_remark, meeting_nub, time )values( #{meetingRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingRoomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unix_timestamp() )
mapper.select: select meeting_room_name,meeting_remark,meeting_nub from meeting_room where meeting_room_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomName},'%') and meeting_nub like CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomNumber},'%') and del=0 limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from meeting_room where meeting_room_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomName},'%') and meeting_nub like CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomNumber},'%') and del=0 limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}
